Description:
Rise, Rapture, Rise uses a new mechanic called Surveillance which instructs players to [i]rotate[/i] encounter cards with the [b]Surveillance[/b] trait in a clockwise fashion, from one location to the next.

By default, TTS rotates cards 90 degrees. For the duration of this campaign, it is recommended you change this setting (found on the right of the Top Menu) to 45 degrees instead.
Name: Notecard
